ComicInfo.Series: Monster Tag Team: The Boogeyman vs. The Scarecrow
ComicInfo.Summary: The first rule of Monster Tag Team is to always expect the unexpected! An unstoppable killing machine plucked straight from your deepest childhood nightmares fueled by pain and malice. A creature bred by both man and magic, born to protect that which it can only imitate with an immortal soul longing for humanity. A decades old feud comes to a climatic end where only one survives! Boogeyman vs. Scarecrow! Lock your doors, check under the bed, and keep your closet door shut. This one's gonna get messy!
